name: Noel GARCIA, Petitioner v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent

parties: Noel GARCIA, Petitioner v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of August, 2012, the Application for Relief is GRANTED. Petitioner is directed to file his Petition for Reconsideration within 14 days of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
51 A.3d 179
Noel GARCIA, Petitioner v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent.
No. 76 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 8, 2012.
